page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content:
Delamere/Eddisbury
{RELIGION There is a Zion Methodist Chapel & Sunday School at the N.E. corner of our area.This was founded in 1870. There is also a very small Catholic church, These are on either side of the B5152,near Hatchmere.
LOCAL HISTORY Eddisbury ridge at a height of approx. 170 metres is certainly the highest area in our sector. In Iron Age times there were hill forts all along the ridge. On the ridge also is Old Pale Farm,built by the Crown in 1835. Old Pale means 'original clearing' & was a paled off or fenced off area for deer grazing.
